Sarah is passionate about science and her community and strives to make science more understandable and accessible through teaching, creating videos, and developing software to aid in biological research.

## Education

Sarah is a PhD candidate in the Bioinformatics & Computational Biology program at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill under the mentorship of [Doug Phanstiel](http://phanstiel-lab.med.unc.edu/ "Phanstiel Lab Website").

She previously graduated from Pepperdine University in 2019 with a BS in Biological Sciences and a minor in Computer Science.
